results.title: Cuber AI Redefines Logistics Efficiency with AgenticX, Wins Prestigious Supply Chain Innovation Award
results.description: SINGAPORE, Oct. 10, 2025 /PRNewswire/ -- Cuber AI Technologies, a pioneering provider of Agentic AI-driven logistics solutions, is setting new global standards in operational efficiency and intelligent automation. Powered by its cutting-edge AgenticX platform built on Agentic AI, Cuber AI enables logistics organizations to elevate human productivity - allowing professionals to focus on strategic decisions while advanced digital employees handle high-volume, repetitive workflows with speed and precision. At the heart of Cuber AI's innovation is its transformation of logistics operations from basic digital tools into intelligent digital employees - autonomous partners that understand context, adapt to change, and execute with human-like judgment. As Managing Director Chee Keong Ng explains, "Level 2 AI operates like a workplace newbie, it follows instructions task by task. In contrast, our Level 4 Autonomous Systems behave like seasoned professionals, capable of multitasking, contextual reasoning, and adapting seamlessly to real-world challenges." AgenticX, Your Intelligent Logistics Digital Assistant This leap in capability has already delivered measurable results. A recent deployment of AgenticX Digital Employees at a leading logistics enterprise achieved a 100% increase in operational efficiency, a 60% reduction in customer service workload, and significantly improved profitability. These outcomes demonstrate the transformative power of human-Agentic AI collaboration in modern supply chains. The innovation has not gone unnoticed. Cuber AI was recently awarded the Supply Chain Innovation Award at the Supply Chain Excellence Awards 2025, recognizing its groundbreaking AgenticX suite. The platform introduces two major technological milestones: AI Level 4 Autonomy - enabling integrated multitasking across complex logistics systems; and CuberLLM V2, a next-generation multimodal large language model that ensures unparalleled precision and speed in intent recognition and task execution. "This award affirms our vision to redefine logistics through AgenticX Digital Employees," said Mr. Ng. "It celebrates the dedication of our team and the confidence placed in us by more than 1,000 enterprises across the Asia-Pacific region." Cuber AI's influence continues to expand across the region. At the recent China-ASEAN Expo 2025 in Nanning, the company showcased AgenticX Digital Employees to logistics leaders exploring digital transformation. The platform demonstrated how Agentic AI empowers mid-sized logistics firms to scale rapidly, augmenting human teams with digital employees who work tirelessly, consistently, and intelligently. Focusing primarily on Singapore and the wider ASEAN markets - regions known for progressive digital adoption - Cuber AI designs AgenticX solutions tailored to the pragmatic needs of fast-growing logistics companies. For firms employing 200-300 staff, Agentic AI is increasingly viewed not as a cost, but as a strategic investment in future capacity, resilience, and competitiveness. Looking ahead, Cuber AI remains committed to driving the next evolution of intelligent logistics. By championing a future where humans and digital employees powered by AgenticX co-pilot operations, the company is not only optimizing productivity but also shaping the global standard for autonomous, adaptive, and resilient supply chains. Media Contact: Yiyi Liu Marketing Director Cuber AI Technologies Pte Ltd Email: ee.liu@cuberai.com Website: www.cuberai.com

results.title: From Road to Sky: BingEx and Hangzhou Join Forces to Launch a Next-Generation Urban Drone Network
results.description: BEIJING, Oct. 10, 2025 /PRNewswire/ -- BingEx Limited (Nasdaq: FLX), a Nasdaq-listed company best known through its business brand FlashEx, the leading on-demand dedicated courier service provider in China, has partnered with Hangzhou city and local businesses to launch a city-wide low-altitude logistics network, now in commercial pilot. The project combines low-altitude infrastructure, last-mile delivery demand, and intelligent drone capacity to create an efficient, safe, and sustainable urban air-logistics system. FlashEx Drone Drawing on over 11 years of operational expertise, a nationwide network covering 297 cities, and a user base of hundreds of millions, FlashEx delivers precise order forecasting, site recommendations for takeoff and landing, route planning, and intelligent scheduling to drive low-altitude logistics and maximize efficiency. The city-level solution spans four key modules: infrastructure, demand integration, capacity supply, and operations management. Its first routes are already live, with a flawless "zero-incident, zero-accident" record. Low-altitude logistics, a key driver of next-generation productivity, goes beyond on-demand delivery to provide efficient solutions for long-distance, time-sensitive, and specialized orders. By integrating drones with on-site teams, it lightens riders' workloads, minimizes risks, and elevates both service quality and the end-user experience. FlashEx Drone Prepares for Landing By the end of 2025, FlashEx aims to establish an initial city-wide low-altitude logistics network in Hangzhou, creating a scalable and replicable model to drive China's low-altitude economy. The company will continue investing in technology, expanding its footprint in this emerging logistics segment, and supporting the development of modern industrial systems and consumer services.
